title: Regional support for Mexican PAN and PRD

content.prompt: Which of the following statements best characterizes the varying geographic distribution of the electoral support received by the Party of the Democratic Revolution (PRD) and the National Action Party (PAN) in Mexico since 2000 ?

choices.label: The PRD and the PAN do equally well in the northern, central, and southern regions of Mexico.
The PAN receives significantly more support in rural areas than the PRD does.
The PRD receives significantly more support along the border with the United States than the PAN does.
The PAN and the PRD do equally well in Mexico City.
The PAN receives significantly more support in northern Mexico than the PRD does.
